Main

Rohan Danis-Cox {#title}
------------------------------------

Data scientist with passion for problem solving with data science and analytics. I believe strongly in leveraging analytics to drive a deep domain knowledge, ensuring data science is targeted, feasible and value driven. My professional and academic background covers financial services, property and consumer protection. I am keen to gain exposure in health care, energy and regional planning.
